welcome: Welcome to the Calorie Tracker Bot! Send me a picture of your food, and I'll estimate the calories for you.
promptErrorMsg: I can't understand you.. Please, send me a picture of a food.
awaitMsg: Analyzing your food... This might take a few seconds.
processingErrorMsg: An error occurred while processing your message. Please try again.
foodRecognizingError: The image you sent is not recognized as containing food. Please send a clear picture of your food.
missunderstandingMsg: Fuuck.. It looks like food, but it breaks my mind! I can't, I just can't...
